DISCOVER THE

TRAFFIC

START

Services

A traffic flow simulation and prediction will increase the efficiency of road transportation. Applications like Waze and Google Maps aid the drivers to be more aware of the traffic and plan their routes with the lightest traffic flow. This shows the efficiency of the application

PREDICTION

Traffic prediction, this proposes to use neural networks like Long Short Term Memory (LSTM), Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU), or Stacked Autoencoder (SAE). The model contains input layers, hidden layers, and an output layer. By using the extracted data from daily traffic flow and the current traffic from datasets and API’s

TRAFFIC FLOW

Real-time traffic flow state simulation and prediction web-based application by extracting big data in the Philippines. The purpose of this study is to deploy a web-based map system that can accurately simulate real-time traffic flow in an area while also offering predictions on traffic flow in the next few hours

About US

QUATRO BRO

Get That Quatro Bro is a three-member group from De La Salle University – Dasmariñas, taking up Computer Engineering program. They are on their third year of college. This project is a requirement for their elective subject – Big Data Analysis.
